citation.article-title: Caloramator mitchellensis sp. nov., a thermoanaerobe isolated from the geothermal waters of the Great Artesian Basin of Australia, and emended description of the genus Caloramator
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Caloramator viterbiensis Seyfried et al. 2002
The description of Caloramator viterbiensis (Seyfried et al., 2002) is emended as follows.
Amorphous Fe(III) oxyhydroxide and Mn(IV), but not vanadium(V) or soluble Fe(III) citrate, are reduced in the presence of 0.2â€Š% yeast extract.
